summary: Completed comprehensive testing of coupon/discount feature for POS system. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: POST /api/coupons/validate - Validate coupon and calculate discount
Coupons page displays list of coupons correctly
Add Coupon button opens modal form
Coupon creation form works for both percentage and fixed discounts
Sales page has coupon input field
Applying valid coupon (SAVE20) shows correct discount
Applying fixed amount coupon (FIXED5) shows correct discount
Invalid coupon shows proper error message
Coupon discount is correctly subtracted from total
Checkout button shows correct total with coupon applied
Navigation between Coupons and Sales pages works
